data.current_summary: Get a Facebook post based on a Uri
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a Facebook post by URI
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific Facebook post using its URI identifier. Accepts the post URI as a parameter and returns the matching FacebookPost object containing post details, metadata, and engagement information. Returns null if no post matches the provided URI.
